title: Please help ID font on old beer label
content:
Hi fellow Typophiles. I was looking through some old vintage labels on eBay and I found this one below. The listing says "old brewery stock" Tivoli Brewing Company original _Mile Hi_ beer bottle label.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014100411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/milehi_5904.JPG)

I was wondering if anyone here would know what font is being used for "Mile Hi".

Thanks :)
author: desktop

comments.content:
I agree with Jan (hand-drawn), but if you want something that could be made to look fairly close, see [Indy Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014100411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/indy/) and imagine adding a fair amount of stroke thickness.

- Mike Yanega
I noticed that [BistroScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014100411/http:/typophile.com/node/36711) (a font being discussed in another thread) is almost a dead wringer.
